column5: PTLA omg A touch of green Just frickin frustrating and disappointing Meanwhile Beyond Meat is up 35 percent Hard to swallow literally and figuratively Still patient but just SIGN A DEAL

PTLA My bull thesis Not one to call for 100 SP but we have to take a step back Is the company worth more than 19 b market cap Sure there is uncertainty to how fast A is being adopted sure there is Trump beating the drum about drug prices but with Europe coming on board and more data coming out with C which is not priced in all all how can this not be a buying opportunity some 25 off recent highs
AIdvisor made a bearish call on PTLA netting in a 2427 gain over 1 month tickeroncomappnewsSearch
PTLA every trade above 1000 shares was a buy and almost all from the DF exchange which is typically institutional somebody wants in
PTLA almost every downtick is on trade below 100 shares and often below 10 shares and still fewer than 100k shares total pure bs
